website_summaries.verdict: Not your typical aqua gloves. This form-fitting pair is designed to increase the intensity of the swim routine while still allowing for finger dexterity.
pros: Excellent for surfing, scuba diving, snorkeling, and underwater photography
Flexible material allows a range of movement
Power of strokes increased while swimming
Can create fingerless gloves if desired by cutting off the fingertips
Easy to remove – just blow into them like a balloon
cons: Not insulated like some other gloves, so won't protect hands in cold water
Can be a challenge to put on without lubrication

customer_reviews.title: Paddle faster when surfing
customer_reviews.text: I have the ML glove and they are great. I got the wrong size and did the return and got the next size smaller. I use them while surfing. Even though I get kidding about them I out paddle the kids and I’m 54 years old. I have been asked not to wear them. So I did. Finding out that they have helped my paddle even when I’m not wearing them. Must be muscle and technique. Use them and improve your paddle speed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First-time user, not a professional swimmer, but liked the Darkfin Webbed Power Gloves.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, the gloves do give you fewer strokes per pool length. Also as some other reviewers have noted, they add resistance to your stroke and was in a bit of pain by the time I was done with my first workout. Have gotten used to the increased resistance and swim more confidently with them on. Indeed they are hard to put in and far easier to do so underwater. Sizing is key, I happened to use the sizing guide on Darkfin's site and bought the right pair.
customer_reviews.author: Juan F. Osegueda

customer_reviews.title: Buy them now.
customer_reviews.text: I went snorkeling/freediving with these and they are excellent. There is a slight learning curb but once you have them figured out, there is no turning back to webless swimming. Put them on in the water, let them flip inside-out when removing and simply blow into them to put them right-side-out. Always wash your gear with fresh water before storage to remove micro organisms and corrosive salt/minerals. (True to size going by their chart in the pictures.)
customer_reviews.author: BuyToReview

customer_reviews.title: You should include a helpful size chart with explanation. ...
customer_reviews.text: You should include a helpful size chart with explanation. I went on to the website and had to talk to a representative before choosing to correct size. Had I not done so, I would have given up because these are skin tight and dfficult with the size options and measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Rufus

customer_reviews.title: Greatly enhanced performance
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect and work fantastic. I am recovering from a spinal fusion and nerve issues inhabit using my legs when swimming. Unfortunately swimming is also the only exercise I can do right now. I purchased the gloves about a month ago and have not been disappointed. The quality is excellent and they create just the right amount of arm resistance while swimming. They also add excellent forward propulsion which makes up for having to drag the dead weight of my nonfunctuonal legs behind me. I would have given 5 stars but they were a little on the pricey side. Although don't get me wrong. The quality clearly exceeds other swim gloves out there.
customer_reviews.author: knuckles

customer_reviews.title: I love these gloves thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.text: these gloves are awesome big do exactly what they supposed to I'm so happy with them the only thing I don't like is one I wish they had them in a blue because my outfit is blue and also I have large hands so even though they fit they're kind of tight my shoe size is 14 so my hands and my fingers are pretty big it would be nice if they came in a different color like blue and just a slight bit bigger thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Big Tone

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought DarkFin Webbed Power Swimming Gloves after watching a youtube video on how they were produced and they showed the process which all seems like a big lie to me now. The gloves I received were defective and poorly made with visible bubbles, drips, and holes in the outer rubber/latex material plus too small for my hands even after using Darkfins hand size measuring chart. The gloves have nicks in the outside material all over and I was dissatisfied with the quality . Wish they could have sent me something quality so I didn't have to pull these out on my diving trip. Hopefully the correct the issue, but you cant even conta
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Month of use and no deterioration
customer_reviews.text: These are so flexible and thin. I can adjust my swim goggles or snorkel with ease. The extra power from these gloves have shaved off 10 minutes on my 50 lap time. Noticed I get and keep within my aerobic heart rate zone from the added resistance the full hand web design. Kudos to the customer service team, they solved the fit problem and offered satisfaction right away...putting the customer first is unusual in this digital age of internet purchases. Would highly recommend these gloves to anyone wanting a more efficient workout.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Hand in glove comments
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5 stars for comfort. I used the chart depicting the hand. Worked well for me. I am female and wear a size 8 glove. I have long fingers. I ordered a medium female glove. Very easy to remove....I just blow into the glove and they slip right off ( I do this in the pool because water helps). Putting them on takes some getting use to because of the snug fit. Put gloves on underwater. You're supposed to be able to do it in 15 seconds. After some practice I can get them on in 15 seconds. I use them for a little added water resistance while swimming to tone my arms. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE for 1-legged Swimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Frequent Flyer of these gloves...my 3rd (maybe 4th) pair. I'm a right Above The Knee (AKA) amputee and LOVE the water. With these gloves, and 1 fin, no problem keeping up with other divers. Lap swim is now practical and enjoyable. I dropped a star only because I wear them out doing pool maintenance; to be fair...they're not work gloves. If used ONLY as intended, AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wehner

customer_reviews.title: FINtastic!! Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. Exactly what I have wanted for years. The perfect blend... they keep my fingers warm and are great for training. Super flexible so I can swim with or without using the webbing simply by opening or closing my hands. I have Raynauds syndrome so struggle to keep my fingers warm enough when swimming long distances or staying in the water for a length of time. Now, I can just keep swimming. Thank you, Darkfin.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy I

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs Up...
customer_reviews.text: It is often we see something we need and buy it, but it doesn't work as advertised. I'm training for a swim across the Hudson so I'm doing a few hours per week of open water swim and I'm happy to say that these gloves work perfectly, just as advertised. I'm swimming in a salt water bay, so it isn't quite the same as open ocean, but these gloves definitely give you more of a bite with each stroke, I highly recommend them. I also used the 20% off coupon they give you in the product packaging to buy the associate booties which will fit inside your swim fins :)
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for catching more waves.
customer_reviews.text: These work exactly as intended and are very comfortable, easy to clean, and durable. I frequently swim with these and the power of my strokes are amplified and so is the stress on my chest and arm muscles. It makes for a great workout. I originally purchased these for better sprinting on a surfboard to catch more waves. In that regard they are perfect and I’m glad I have them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam J.

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are great!
customer_reviews.text: I have short wide hands... wasn't sure if I would be better with an MT or a M size. I got the M. Its kinda difficult for me to get these gloves on, in the water is the easiest way. Once I get them on, the finger length is perfect, wish it was just slightly wider though. Really does feel like a second skin!! Great for swimming
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Altman

customer_reviews.title: Really cool but don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Actually they are really cool and fun but they don’t last very long. I swim laps 5/6 times in the week and I bought mine end of August, now they are done and I need new ones :-(
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Gloves are Awesome.  Make sure to use the sizing tool on their website
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered the wrong size and they were too small. Contacted the vendor (darkfingloves.com) and they gave me a free pair - and - told me to keep the ones I already had. Outstanding customer service/relations.
customer_reviews.author: EOC7

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very very good I’m using for swimming and snorkeling And incredible for surfiny Go faster and much stronger strokes I Love this gloves My second pair I Recommend Very good grip I fill with water before i put in Much easier Absolutely awesome 5 stars That’s my sincere opinion Nobody pay me nothing
customer_reviews.author: juliano vitta gorga

customer_reviews.title: Creature from the Black Lagoon
customer_reviews.text: Alright I have to admit to using these gloves for a purpose for which they are not intended...as part of a Halloween costume. Yes, the creature from the black lagoon is not complete without webbed hands. Makes it hard to shake hands, but is fun to watch people try to shake the hand of a real creature. Have been on the Internet so long you could say I am an old hand with the web. See? It works. Also, not that expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Watchman

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: My husband liked these gloves a lot, they were easy to put on in water and made quite a workout out of casual swimming in a pool. He could even swim without kicking feet or helping with legs. He could still use fingers for fixing glasses and handling objects as the tips are not sewed into the webbed part and you don’t lose the dexterity. Will be taking them on our next snorkeling trip.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Golovkova

customer_reviews.title: Nice,fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed them, were good for workouts and just fooling around in the water. However, durability not as good as some of the alternatives, but to be fair I put them through a lot of abuse (Kept in a bag in the back of the truck in southern heat)
customer_reviews.author: Fearadhach

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swim with and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The gloves work as advertised. The glove size guide worked well for me. They fit well. The gloves are very easy to swim with, without the need to alter your stroke. I cannot comment on durability yet. I swam for many years with paddles, and the gloves provide an equivalent workout, but I think I prefer the gloves. If you swim long enough, it is nice to introduce variation in your routine and the gloves provide a change that I think most swimmer would enjoy. I initially ordered the wrong size, and the company went out of its way to replace them. I will certainly buy more when these go bust.
customer_reviews.author: Michel Lavallee

customer_reviews.title: If your not sure of the size order the bigger size
customer_reviews.text: Measured my hand the according to instructions. But my measurements didn't match the sizes presented (length bigger or width smaller) and figured I better go with the smaller size. When the glove arrived today it took me forever to get them on and they were so tight I could feel my heart beat in the palm of my hand. Needless to say I'm sending them back to get a bigger size. The material is definitely nice quality and seems solid. I'll update this when I get a pair that fits
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: The gloves worked well and really helped propel me thru the water on long ocean swims 2-3hrs long. They are a bit hard to get on, using water to semi fill the glove was an effective technique. Practice a bit before you need to gear up. I got one tear [4mm] due to some coral I had to climb up on. Good gloves
customer_reviews.author: Max Fleischer

customer_reviews.title: These gloves work
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. I use them for water arobics they keep my hands warm and out of the water because I suffer from arthitis. No water gets in and they also help me move faster around the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jab

customer_reviews.title: great design too thin for thermal barrier .
customer_reviews.text: I wore these gloves in Folsom lake , Monterey, and Lake Tahoe (10 dives total)and they are very good if they were 3 mil instead of 1 mill they would have good thermal . I wore a dry suit for all the dives and my hands were the coldest part of my body . Yes I wore a hood. If they were 3 mil I would buy these all day and tell all my dive friends. The fit was good use the chart and you can't miss.
customer_reviews.author: maury hicks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for resistance exercises for me.
customer_reviews.text: I use these flexible rubber webbed gloves to do various arm and shoulder resistance exercises three days a week. They also provide excellent drag when I'm water walking. I see swimmers in the lap pool using a variety of cloth gloves webbed to give them more stroke power as they swim, but what they use can't hold a candle to "Darkfin"
customer_reviews.author: Bill in Western North Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Adds nice maneuverability
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit means they are a little tough to get on, easier in the water. They move a good volume of water to increase your speed and bouncy, while allowing your fingers freedom for most tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner surfer and needed something to assist with my paddling abilities. I no longer use the gloves now as I feel that my upper body and arm strength is adequate for paddling into a wave.
customer_reviews.author: Rochalle Rooks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome swimming Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are super awesome, customer service was also amazing in helping when I had questions. Their durability was as advertised, and were more comfortable than I had actually initially expected. At first upon reading the description about the cotton grip thing, I was skeptical, because latex gloves tend to lack grip, but once again, per the advertisement you do not lose all of your standard traction upon wearing them. Would recommend if you wanna feel super awesome while in the water. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Milesroman

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about purchasing these even though I really wanted to. I am so happy I finally decided to just do it. I love these gloves. They fit as expected. I use them during my recreational swimming and for workouts, five to six days a week. They have no signs of wear. They offer enough dexterity to allow me to adjust my goggles or operate my watch. Long story short, I love these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Surfer hands
customer_reviews.text: I use these for surfing. They worked out well enough that I was able to out paddle much younger surfers for the same waves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great glove to enhance being in water
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and while I don't live near the ocean or a large lake I do have a pool. Talk about making swimming more interesting! They're great entertainment and overall just make the experience of being in the water new again. I happened to order a size too small and the company really showed great customer service in working with me to get me the correct size! I'd very much give them 5 stars for how the showed each customer is valued!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: really cheap/weird fit
customer_reviews.text: Very much a mass produced injection molded rubber product. Does not look anything like picture (think something sitting in a dusty warehouse for 10 years). Already one small rip. They do work and are fun to use, just wish the quality wasn't so mediocre.
customer_reviews.author: clevernonsense

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove
customer_reviews.text: Print out the hand size diagram off their site. Item is perfect for my hand. So far the gloves feel nice, I hope they last since they are latex and not silicone. Customer service was great too! They help me swim somewhat faster
customer_reviews.author: Nny

customer_reviews.title: Meh.... was excited about the idea of these. Less excited about the outcome.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this, but it didn't really work out the way I imagined. If felt like the gloves were full of water, and hard to ignore the feeling as you swim. I tried them once and threw them in the back of the locker never to be used again. As other reviewers have noted... the webbing should really have been on the front-hand side of the glove.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymz

customer_reviews.title: Easiest to wash and no-rip thick molding
customer_reviews.text: Great for paddle-out on serious days when you have to keep those fingers closed tight for torque against the backwash
customer_reviews.author: Max K Delbrück

customer_reviews.title: Really hard to get on and off.
customer_reviews.text: I have to return these because I can’t get them on. I guess once they’re on, they’ll stay put, but it’s too much of a struggle for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Lilienthal

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved thes gloves. Don’t know how to swim well but this helped me master the breaststroke. I also use a snorkel mask so breathing is not an issue. I’m sure with more practice I will get better swimming!
customer_reviews.author: Peter R.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, but run large
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. I've tried many resistance gloves. These are the most comfortable and durable I've had and would highly recommend them. However, either kids hands are a lot larger than they used to be or my hands are really, really small. Knowing my hands are relatively small, but not unusually so, I opted for the kids large size. To my surprise they were too big. I ordered the kids small (skipped the mediums) and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Betti G. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Amazing material that really helped my aqua abilities. Fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.text: Snug as expected! Having used many water gloves, these are the most realistic feeling in the water. A little easy to tear so if you spend a lot of time in the water, get a backup pair!
customer_reviews.author: H_Green

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for swimming to increase my muscles in my arms. I ordered the small and could not get them on and returned them and got the medium, which I still cannot get on so am going to try large but am afraid they will be huge. They would be a great glove if I could get them on, I really like the concept of how they are made.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits large women's hands
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, I have large hands and these fit great without filling up with extra water.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Turner

customer_reviews.title: Fun to swim with/ great customer service
customer_reviews.text: These gloves totally improved my stroke swimming. I got them to help protect my finger tips from some effects of chemotherapy from hurting when I swam. The materials are natural but powerful in the water. I measured too Big originally and DarkFin got back to me immediately how to arrange for a better fit. It’s a very responsive company
customer_reviews.author: D. Kasman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product indeed love, love it
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it the product only thing I will say is that finished work is a bit rough but all 5 star 🌟 all the way Planning to buy another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Super power gloves :-))  !
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my purchase. I have been using the gloves for 4 months now and they provide protection and speed. I feel like superwoman when I slip them on and start swimming !! They can be a little difficult to put on a the beginning, I was especially scared of ripping them but I know now they are sturdy and I slide them on and off in the water very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dolan Cybele

customer_reviews.title: Not what they described!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these before and loved them unfortunately they sent me very thick latex, with no cotton flick on the outside. In the description it states: Lightweight latex won't absorb water and get heavy. Cotton flock surface provides excellent grip. Very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Renneberg

customer_reviews.title: Gives me a lot more speed in the water
customer_reviews.text: They're a little hard to get on and off, but fit really well when on. I'm into snorkeling and using my underwater camera and it takes a little practice with the gloves on, but no problem after a few swims.
customer_reviews.author: Wally Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to hard plastic paddles
customer_reviews.text: Use the printable sizing chart available on their website to help determine the best fit for you. I use these well made durable gloves to add resistance when I am swimming laps but they are also used by divers and surfboarders. Great purchase for yourself or great gift for that water baby in your life!!
customer_reviews.author: Nora P. Messinger

customer_reviews.title: Where is the customer service?
customer_reviews.text: they seem like nice gloves but one of them had a defect. A hard knot which is about to tear through and I've never even put them on
customer_reviews.author: J. Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: Used them on a week long cruise in the water every day. Had a few different people try them out and everyone loved them. They definitely help push you through the water.
customer_reviews.author: Robert mcgarvey

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: OMG! What a great product for kids. The size chart was spot on. It s a little tricky to put on but once it’s on it’s like having webbed hands! What fun. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: karyn Jean Meiller

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love these great for ocean swimming and helps getting out of the water on rocky shores.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Swimming Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I swim a lot and am a master diver. The gloves were a great addition for me to get more fluid in the water.
customer_reviews.author: CommRoof

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these gloves I like the fact that they a re almost like a second skin. I use them for swimming and I've been looking for pulling gloves that didn't have the fingers tips cut off because I hate how the water gets in when I do freestyle but these gloves solved that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Shae

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great functionally after one use. I have had many shoulder injuries and these help keep me catching waves. The only reason for 4 instead of 5 stars is because the thumb seems to be falling apart a little (see picture) Don't know if that will effect performance or get worse down the road
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality do you not go by sizing chart runs slightly smaller
customer_reviews.text: Good quality do you not go by sizing chart runs slightly smaller
customer_reviews.author: diverdown

customer_reviews.title: really great for a parapleagic
customer_reviews.text: I am a para and only have my arms to use, they work great for getting around in the water
customer_reviews.author: Frank Daebelliehn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my boyfriend. They fit him perfectly! He loves them and can't wait for summer to come around. Although his were big on me, he let me try them out in our cold pool in the middle of winter and they seriously insulate! These are awesome, I a buying another pair for his buddy who goes swimming and spear fishing with him a lot. RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Hollye

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Have swam with them. They perform as promised and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Abate Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, But Buy Bigger Size
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are super durable however I bought XL and should have gotten bigger. They appear to be made our of thick tire tube which awesome but they run kinda small because there is not a lot of give. Otherwise I'm super happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: They take a few minutes to put on, but ...
customer_reviews.text: They take a few minutes to put on, but it is well worth the wait. I have found that, when I doing a stroke (such as the breast stroke) in which I need to bring my hands forward, the webbed gloves allow me to clench my hands and reduce resistance. These gloves work my arm muscles into a burn unlike anything I have ever used. As for the tearing that I have read about: I apply a prodigious amount of talc on the inside, and after a month they show no signs of shredding.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Hardt

customer_reviews.title: Great for surfing
customer_reviews.text: Great for surfing. Get stronger and catch more waves. Who cares if you look like a kook! You’ll be the one laughing when your catching all the waves and building muscle!
customer_reviews.author: SteakxxCHOP

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and functional for work or play
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and let’s you move your fingers and press camera or other buttons/switches. For use for play or working under boat. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Dicky Woods

customer_reviews.title: Run BIG!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 glove and got the Womens Large, but it was too big. If you get the right size I'm sure they are great, although taking them off is a pain. The sizing chart is a little misleading so be careful and order a size smaller then you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G.

customer_reviews.title: I use these snorkeling, and they work well. ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these snorkeling, and they work well. The material is strong, and they improve my speed noticeably. You can still handle objects fairly well while wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves, order larger size.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair as the first size I ordered was basically for a child even tho it's measurements said it would fit. So order a size larger. I use them for river surfing in Alberta. They're nice gloves, I wouldn't say they offer a ton of protection from the cold but it's better than nothing. They're strong & durable & increase your paddling huge.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Visually they look like someone laid a pair of latex gloves in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to be used with a costume for webbed hands. The construction quality is not nearly what was expected. Visually they look like someone laid a pair of latex gloves in a pan of liquid latex and then trimmed the excess. All that being said, they probably work just fine for swimming, but visually they were a complete letdown.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ellzey

customer_reviews.title: and in 40 degree water you feel the cold but it's not horrible.. took about an hour an a half ...
customer_reviews.text: Def an advantage..and in 40 degree water you feel the cold but it's not horrible..took about an hour an a half for the cold to bother my fingers surfing..
customer_reviews.author: Innterrupt

customer_reviews.title: Increased control and propulsion.
customer_reviews.text: Really made a difference in control and propulsion. I had a hip disarticulation (no left leg whatsoever). I have been diving for almost 40 years and have never used my arms to move. Now I find it necessary, and these help minimize arm movement.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nagel

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: It fit my hands well, gives more strength, and just looks really cool! They look well made and I love how the webbing is on the back of the glove not between the fingers! One tip to getting them off: grab the bottom and pull it off inside out then once off your hands put it back how it's suppose to be.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D.

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I love the gloves, I swim 1 kilometer everynight at the gym and these have been amazing and they do deliver. I guess that because my hads are thick, they're not easy to put on, but other than that, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but once they are on they are wonderful. They are thin so your fingers get cold ...
customer_reviews.text: I have large hands and they are a little difficult to get on, but once they are on they are wonderful. They are thin so your fingers get cold in cold water, but otherwise they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Glen A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I am very excited to use these for surfing. The gloves are well made and great for getting that extra "umph" in the water. They fit a little small - I would recommend ordering up.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie F. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Never buying wetsuit ones again!
customer_reviews.text: I have long skinny hands. I'm a Large-XL in every glove I've ever owned but had to return these L for some M/L. Fit perfectly! Can't wait to use them
customer_reviews.author: christian

customer_reviews.title: Darkfin customer service is absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Darkfin gloves! The product is fantastic but the customer service was even more so. I purchased the incorrect size and they helped me out quickly and efficiently! Best swim gloves on the market! Thank you, Darkfin!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a BLAST to snorkel in with some foot fins.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Ordered per measurement instructions on web. Ended up too big. Mailed back directly per included instructions. Family member didn't get tracking info. Lost in mail. Company honored it anyways and sent me new pair in the correct size. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: Can't speak to it's long-term durability, but just took it out surfing here in California and loved the added boost I got from the webbed fingers. :)
customer_reviews.author: Conner

customer_reviews.title: Aquaman look out
customer_reviews.text: My wife & kids made fun of me when I bought these. Possibly because I tested them out in our pool first. We went snorkeling in the Bahama's and everyone wanted to steal them from me because they worked so well. Tip: to easily remove them when wet, blow into the edge by your wrist and inflate them like a balloon. They pop right off!
customer_reviews.author: Mark J Britton

customer_reviews.title: Too small/tight
customer_reviews.text: Ordered large and they are barely medium at best... I know you don't want them too loose but I gotta Them on first.... won't go Past my second knuckle.... sizing chart might be useful..!!
customer_reviews.author: F. Smith

customer_reviews.title: they are excellent. I do wish I had known about the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use them but for fit and feel, they are excellent. I do wish I had known about the food grade silicone lubricant spray, I'm really not comfortable spilling talcum powder in the rivers or ocean, there's more than enough S**t in the waters as it is. I hope to find some spray locally, if not I'll order one or two 8oz non-aerosol containers of Trident Food Grade Silicone Spray for Scuba , Snorkel, and Spearfishing Gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit much larger than expected. Did not function as advertised because they were too large.

customer_reviews.title: Not Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: These really worked well. They provided great traction so there was little wasted motion on each paddle stroke. I had great use of my hands wearing them, I didn't feel constrained. They fit well and didn't balloon out by letting water in. It wasn't bad putting them on, maybe a little tough, but they are tough enough to take the tugging.
customer_reviews.author: Erick J.

customer_reviews.title: usefull items for swimming improving
customer_reviews.text: Firstly I ordered it only because I imagine myself with frog hands while swimming my my colleagues, then I realized that It is a very usefull stuff, surely less stressing than the standard paddle used for the same purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shark
customer_reviews.text: They work well in the water worried about long term. We will see
customer_reviews.author: Tom mosier

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these handfins. I haven't had any problems putting them on. I move much quicker through the water. My arms get exhausted much faster. Trying to get used to them before I take them diving next month. Will see how that goes. Larges fit me perfectly and I usually wear a large glove
customer_reviews.author: Hendo

customer_reviews.title: These are very good, though make sure you get a bigger size ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very good, though make sure you get a bigger size than you think you need. The ones I got are tight on me even though I thought I was careful to get a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Payne

customer_reviews.title: they are not bad, but it feels very unconfortable to use latex
customer_reviews.text: they are not bad, but it feels very unconfortable to use latex, is better neoprene, and they only lasted 8 months, after that the latex starts to break apart
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: She's faster than the fishes!
customer_reviews.text: My neice is a little surfer girl, and these are perfect for her. They don't slick up too much when they get wet so she can grip her board really well, but they work really well to tread water. These gloves have the fishes doing double takes!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Super for swimming, snorkeling, scuba
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves using them. They gave him a little extra propulsion but didn't inhibit the use of his hands.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie P

customer_reviews.title: This product works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I swim laps in a pool and I use fins for resistance. I like them very much except I have tiny wrist so they don’t fit snugly around my wrist and fill with water. But other than that I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Dori C.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied..
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really write reviews for products, but these are awesome. Not only do I swim faster underwater, but they provide more buoyancy in deep water. Great product...........
customer_reviews.author: Keith Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fit right
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit my tiny hands, even after using the manufactory sizing . water gets inside it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Tanty Suhartono

customer_reviews.title: Great for swimming workouts
customer_reviews.text: I got these for swimming workouts and I must say, they have blown every expectation I have. They provide additional resistance, in a very gentle way. I still am able to use my hands to adjust my goggles, etc, which I could not with regular swimming paddles.
customer_reviews.author: Paula C

customer_reviews.title: Size is tricky. Hand measurements don't address hand thickness/ thinness.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for snorkling. Used them in the pool. So far so good. I get through the pool with less effort and they seem to do the job. The molding can be cleaner and smoother. Not sure how this will affect performance in stronger current yet.
customer_reviews.author: Erosel

customer_reviews.title: ... when it waves are high and they do a wonderful job. I only wish I could put them ...
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use them to manoeuvre myself close to shore rocks when it waves are high and they do a wonderful job. I only wish I could put them on without the need of some lubricant. I use a little bit of talcum powder though and it works great :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ioannis Arvanitis

customer_reviews.title: He was delighted with them
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my son, who kayaks and swims. He was delighted with them, says they are very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Ann R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: A bit tight - might want to order next size up!
customer_reviews.author: Sean McKerran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it sooooo much! Very nimble, and provides great mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: ... pull you along through the water and they are great for building strength in your
customer_reviews.text: They really helped to pull you along through the water and they are great for building strength in your shoulders
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DarkFin Webbed Power Swimming Gloves (1 Pair) for Men, Women, Scuba Diving, Snorkeling, Spearfishing, Surfing in Cold Water, Ultra Thin Hand Fins, Pool Swim Paddles for Water Aerobics, Black
feature_bullets: IMAGINE IMPROVING YOUR PADDLE SPEED - dive gloves are made with 3-D web profile, which compared to your bare hand for propulsion, increases surface area by 70 percent. Much more power and speed in the water

HANDLE OBJECTS EASILY - ultra-thin, 0.9 mm or 1/28 inch Second Skin scuba diving gloves give finger dexterity to pick small objects, to press small buttons on a camera underwater or to adjust diving gear
STAY LONGER IN THE WATER WITH WETSUIT GLOVES - this extra layer on your hands helps to keep them warmer, so you can enjoy catching waves or diving for longer

GET THE SWIM GLOVES ON/OFF WITH EASE - we recommend spraying a small amount of silicone lubricant spray on your hands and spread with a rubbing motion. Or get into the water, fill the water gloves with water and put your hands in, then take the diving gloves above the water and squeegee down. To remove, just blow into the edge by your wrist and inflate them like a balloon. They pop right off
MADE IN USA. GET THE RIGHT SIZE - the aqua gloves should fit tight and at the same time comfortable like a wetsuit. Look into the size chart to find the best size for your hands.
